title: Pasta with Prawns, Courgettes and Lemon

ingredients.content: 1 lemon, thin peelings of skin and 30 g juice
30 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (3 cm)
1 tsp fine sea salt, to taste
1 - 2 pinches ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place lemon peel and Parmesan in mixing bowl then grate <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place vegetable stock and salt in mixing bowl. Place Varoma dish into position then weigh in prawns and pour 15 g lemon juice over the top. Insert Varoma tray then add courgettes and garlic then steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside.

Add tagliatelle through hole in mixing bowl lid and cook <b>1 min 30 sec/100°C//speed <b>. Place Varoma into position then cook <b>select time indicated on packet/100°C//speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma. Drain pasta through simmering basket reserving cooking liquid, then place in a serving bowl, stir through oil, cover and keep warm.

Place 100 g cooking liquid in mixing bowl. Discard garlic cloves, add half the cooked courgettes, crème fraîche, remaining 15 g lemon juice, chives, dill and pepper then blend <b>20 sec/speed 8<b>. Reheat courgette sauce <b>2 min/90°C/speed 1<b>.
Add remaining cooked courgettes to pasta in serving bowl then add prawns and courgette sauce. Mix well. Sprinkle with grated lemon-Parmesan mixture before serving immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Sauté the courgettes in a pan with olive oil before garnishing the pasta for an even more delicious flavour.
